description.component: Alerts are available for any length of text, as well as an optional close button. For proper styling, use one of the eight required contextual classes (e.g., .alert-success).

type.name: Alert type
type.description: Bootstrap includes several predefined alert type styles.

dismissible.name: Dismissible
dismissible.description: It is possible to dismiss any alert inline, When an alert is dismissed, the element is completely removed from the page structure.

heading.name: Alert heading
heading.description: Alerts can also contain primary alert heading.

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes that can be used to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom classes to this component.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: HTML attributes for the alert element.
